LanguageData.VFEE_AcidifierFletcher.label: acidifier
LanguageData.VFEE_AcidifierFletcher.description: Acidifier mixture injected into veins through a fletcher dart. Causes extreme pain and nearly instant death through internal acid burns.
LanguageData.VFEE_AcidifierToxblade.label: acidifier
LanguageData.VFEE_AcidifierToxblade.description: Acidifier mixture injected into veins through a fletcher dart. Causes extreme pain and nearly instant death through internal acid burns.
